description: With nearly 10,000 games of Pariah Nexus logged in Tabletop Battles we're taking a look at how the new season is shaping up and how scoring has changed for the factions of Warhammer 40,000.
title: Hammer of Math: Stats From the First 10,000 Games of Pariah Nexus

description: Goonhammer Historicals is here with some news you can use – the pre-order date for 3rd Edition Bolt Action is nearly upon us! Nottingham, UK, 01/07/2024 – Warlord Games are delighted to announce […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals: Bolt Action 3rd Edition Pre-Order Date Announced

description: Hello there sports fans! In a mere five days, we at Goonhammer are running our second-ever Blood Bowl tournament at the GHO 2024 near Baltimore, Maryland! Dan’s here to fill you in on what’s happening, what to expect, and how to beat the heat! It’s been a while, sports fans, but I’m back to drum […]
title: The Swelter Bowl II at the Goonhammer Open Baltimore 2024
